design.name: End Institutional Bullying Campaign Website
design.description: A website built for DRUM's end institutional bullying campaign in schools

design.name: Morphobank
design.description: I worked for almost a year part time helping maintain a web app that presented a database for morphologists to share papers, data, and taxonomize specimens and taxa

design.name: Spoke Community Manager
design.description: Spoke is an open-source peer-to-peer SMS tool used by the Progressive Movement for outreach. Community management is a mixed bag of project management, community organizing, and engineering management
